Package ZombiesGame.model

Class Model

java.lang.Object
ZombiesGame.model.Model
public class Model extends Object
Model class: stores all game data - entities, positions, scores, game states, etc. handles all logic - velocity calculations, collision calculations and logic, updates to entity states, removing entities, updating score and difficulty

  • Constructor Details

    • Model

      public Model()
      model constructor: generates a new file that stores highscore upon first time running program

  • Method Details

    • createNewGame

      public void createNewGame​(int width, int height, int spriteSize)
      creates a new game/restarts game by resetting game state
      Parameters:
      width - width of screen
      height - height of screen
      spriteSize - size of the object sprites

    • createPlayer

      public void createPlayer()
      creates a new player in the center of the screen, calculated using screen width, screen height, and pixel size adds to active game entities -> player always assumed to be at index 0 (first entity added)

    • createProjectile

      public void createProjectile​(Point mousePos)
      creates a new projectile at the position of the player calculates and sets a predefined trajectory using player and mouse position adds to active game entities
      Parameters:
      mousePos - position of the mouse when mouse click or press occurs

    • createEnemy

      public void createEnemy()
      creates a new enemy at a random position along the edge of the screen(left, right, top, or bottom border) adds to game, increments enemy counter

    • updatePlayerVelocity

      public void updatePlayerVelocity()
      updates the player velocity based on which keys are being pressed

    • updateEnemyVelocity

      private void updateEnemyVelocity​(Entity enemy)
      updates the velocity of a given enemy recalculates velocity so that enemy moves towards player
      Parameters:
      enemy - Enemy object whose velocity will be updated

    • updateEntities

      public void updateEntities()
      updates all entity positions and player and enemy velocities

    • updateScore

      public void updateScore​(int scoreValue)
      updates the current score using given parameter if total score reaches a certain point, update the difficulty
      Parameters:
      scoreValue - amount that the total score is incremented by

    • updateDifficulty

      private void updateDifficulty​(int maxEnemies, int enemySpeed)
      updates the difficulty by changing the max enemies allowed on the screen, and the speed of enemy movement
      Parameters:
      maxEnemies - the max number of enemies that are allowed to exist at a time
      enemySpeed - the speed of the enemies (amount that they move per update call)

    • saveScoreToFile

      public void saveScoreToFile()
      saves high score to file "score.txt" by writing to the file

    • checkScoreInFile

      public String checkScoreInFile()
      reads the high score
      Returns:
      String value containing the high score stored in file

    • updateHighScore

      public void updateHighScore()
      update the high score in file if current score is higher than previously recorded score updates the high score variable

    • checkCollisions

      public void checkCollisions()
      checks collisions between every entity in the game makes appropriate changes to game states when collision occurs between specific entities (velocities, score, alive/dead state)

    • checkBoundaryCollisions

      public void checkBoundaryCollisions()
      Checks if entities collide with boundaries, execute changes to their states if collision occurs (change their velocities or set them to inactive)

    • removeInactive

      public void removeInactive()
      remove all entities that were set as inactive during collision checks (removes them from the game)

    • getScore

      public int getScore()
      gets current score
      Returns:
      current score

    • getHighScore

      public int getHighScore()
      gets current high score
      Returns:
      current high score

    • getEntities

      public LinkedList<Entity> getEntities()
      gets the list of entities that are active(for drawing in the view)
      Returns:
      list containing currently active entities

    • getGameStatus

      public GameInfo getGameStatus()
      gets info from model necessary for drawing in the view
      Returns:
      GameInfo class that stores necessary info from model to draw in view

    • addEntity

      public void addEntity​(Entity e)
      used for testing model class only
      Parameters:
      e - Entity to be added to list of active entities
